locationkit 2.2.1 API

LocationKit(TM) for Android -- LocationKit is an advanced SDK that provides enhanced location capabilities to Android and iOS mobile apps.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
socialradar.locationkit
LocationKit(TM) for Android -- LocationKit is an advanced SDK that provides enhanced location capabilities to Android and iOS mobile apps.
socialradar.locationkit.exception
Exceptions specific to LocationKit service and callback methods
socialradar.locationkit.model
Model objects representing data from LocationKit services and callback operations.
LocationKit(TM) for Android -- LocationKit is an advanced SDK that provides enhanced location capabilities to Android and iOS mobile apps.

Features Include:

Higher Accuracy
Lower Battery Drain
Automatic Venue Detection
Detailed Location Analytics for app developers via a web portal

Requirements

LocationKit for Android supports API Level 15 and above (Ice Cream Sandwich MR1) with Google Play Services

AndroidManifest.xml

LocationKit merges the following items into the AndroidManifest.xml at build time.

Permissions

The following permissions are needed for LocationKit to run.
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE -- used with WIFI_STATE to reduce power usage and improve location using network data
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.INTERNET -- needed to communicate with back end web services
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED -- allows application tracking to restart on reboot.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
com.google.android.gms.permission.ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION -- improves battery performance by coordinating collection with activity

Application Elements

socialradar.locationkit.LocationKitService -- an Android service that provides an interface for the SDK
socialradar.locationkit.LocationKitBootReceiver -- a boot receiver that allows LocationKit to automatically re-start when a phone is powered on

Third Party Libraries

The following third party library dependencies are automatically added if needed to your project through the gradle build system. Third party libraries are copyright their respective authors and used under license provided by same.

Gson 2.3.+
Retrofit 1.9.+
